CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "1", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "2", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "3", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "4", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "5", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
IF(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) = "6", TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-365)),
TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) )))))))
CustomField.label: Fiscal Year
